page.title: 04Marldon Clubs, Young People
page.content: The{playgroup}meets in the Village Hall on 3 mornings each week. It is organised by Mrs.Neil and her helpers, Mrs.Keay and Mrs.Moore. The mothers of the children help on a rota. Children go from the age of 3 until they go to school at 5. The mothers are all on the playgroup committee. {Brownies, Guides, Cubs and Scouts.} The Scouts meet in the school on Friday evenings. The others use the Village Hall. They are all run by local people. They all attend Church Parade once a month in our church. {Youth Club.} This meets in the village hall every Friday evening. {Claws and Paws. This is a pet club which meets every mpnth on Sunday afternoons in the Hall. Children and adults bring their furry pets and a visitor gives prizes.
